FAQ.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
FAQ.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.question1: What is the tape-in hair extension system?
FAQ.answer1: It is a hair lengthening technique, involving the application of portions of natural hair to give an effect of length and volume.
FAQ.question2: How long do hair extensions last?
FAQ.answer2: They can last an average of 6 months to 2 years with proper care.
FAQ.question3: How to take care of your hair extensions?
FAQ.answer3: Use specific products, avoid excessive heat, and maintain them regularly, every 3 months at most.
FAQ.question4: Can I do physical activities with hair extensions?
FAQ.answer4: Yes, no problem. Just keep the hair dry and tied up to avoid tangling.
